package Doubt_Class_1;

import java.util.Scanner;

public class Replace_Them_All {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
		long n = sc.nextLong();
		int mul = 1;
		long ans = 0;
		if(n==0) {
			ans=5;
		}
		while (n > 0) {
			int rem = (int) (n % 10);
			if (rem == 0) {
				ans = ans + 5 * mul;
			} else {
				ans = ans + rem * mul;
			}
			n /= 10;
			mul = mul * 10;
		}
		System.out.println(ans);

	}

}
